title: Repainter v1.1.0 brings separate accent/background color selection and a new QS tile
content:
In January this year, XDA Senior Member kdrag0n released a new app called Repainter. The app unlocks the full potential of Material You‘s dynamic theming and lets users customize various aspects without requiring root access. The app is getting even better with its latest update, and it now lets you pick separate accent and background

The post Repainter v1.1.0 brings separate accent/background color selection and a new QS tile appeared first on xda-developers.
description: The latest update for XDA Senior Member kdrag0n's Repainter app brings a new option to let you pick separate background and accent colors.
